definition: abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: Harry pulled his copy of Advanced Potion-Making out of his bag and looked up Felix Felicis.
sentences.chinese: 哈利從書包裏抽出《高級魔藥製作》，查找福靈劑。

sentences.english: THE CELESTINE PROPHECY contains secrets that are currently changing our world.
sentences.chinese: 聖境預言書包含祕密，目前正在改變我們的世界。

sentences.english: All schoolbags should be put on the shelves.
sentences.chinese: 學生進入圖書館後，請將書包放在書包架上。

sentences.english: All schoolbags should be put on the shelves.
sentences.chinese: 學生進入圖書館後，請將書包放在書包架上。

sentences.english: On the bag, you can see a little tiger, It's very lovely.
sentences.chinese: 在書包上面你可以看到一個小老虎，它很可愛。

sentences.english: When I reached the school gate, I realized I forgot the schoolbag.
sentences.chinese: 當我到達學校門口時，我發現我忘了帶書包。

sentences.english: Bags and personal items may be left at the Cloakroom at Mezzanine level.
sentences.chinese: 書包與私人物件可被寄放在閣樓的‘斗篷室’。

sentences.english: Before doing morning exercises, I threw a bag into a lot of bags.
sentences.chinese: 做操之前，我把書包丟到放着一堆書包的地方。

sentences.english: Before doing morning exercises, I threw a bag into a lot of bags.
sentences.chinese: 做操之前，我把書包丟到放着一堆書包的地方。

sentences.english: Children picked through the debris to uncover school bags and torn books.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們在廢墟中找尋上學的書包和殘破的書本。

sentences.english: Once carried a bag, the boy stood at the platform, listened to the music quietly.
sentences.chinese: 曾經揹着書包，站在站臺，安靜聽歌等公車的男孩。

sentences.english: The Moukisac is made of a nice suede-like material about the size of a small satchel.
sentences.chinese: 它由上好的絨面類材料製成，大小相當於一個小書包。

sentences.english: This book contains 12 stories, including 6 English stories.
sentences.chinese: 這本書包含12篇故事，其中包括6篇英語故事。

sentences.english: G0 C My brother always misplaces his schoolbag.
sentences.chinese: 我弟弟常常亂放他的書包。

sentences.english: Take my satchel without pen and paper, I write poetry for you in my heart.
sentences.chinese: 跨上書包，不帶筆紙，我在心裏，爲你寫詩。

definition: unimportant/not serious/it doesn't matter/never mind/it looks all right, but
to finish class/to get out of class
not saying anything further (idiom); not raising any objection/without demur
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise
to (carry) on one's person/to (take) with one
to tie/bind or fasten together/to kidnap
to go to class/to attend class/to go to teach a class
